alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 21 at 5:05AM EST until January 21 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Localized minor flooding and splash over is possible at the time of high tide late this morning. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/10 AM 10.6 1.8 0.8 4 None 21/11 PM 8.8 -0.0 0.5 3 None 22/11 AM 10.1 1.3 0.0 2 None 23/12 AM 8.7 -0.1 0.1 3 None 23/12 PM 10.5 1.7 0.4 3 None 24/01 AM 8.2 -0.6 -0.6 4 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/10 AM 11.0 1.5 0.8 4 Minor 21/11 PM 9.2 -0.3 0.5 3 None 22/11 AM 10.5 1.0 0.0 2 None 23/12 AM 9.1 -0.4 0.1 3 None 23/12 PM 10.9 1.4 0.4 3-4 None 24/01 AM 8.6 -0.9 -0.6 4 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 21/10 AM 12.0 2.3 0.8 1 Minor 21/11 PM 10.2 0.5 0.6 1 None 22/11 AM 11.7 2.0 0.2 1 None 23/12 AM 10.0 0.3 0.1 1 None 23/12 PM 11.9 2.2 0.4 2 None 24/01 AM 9.2 -0.5 -0.9 2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
